name: Running
instructions: Start with a brisk walk, then gradually increase your pace to a comfortable running speed. Maintain good posture and land softly on your feet.

name: Jump Rope
instructions: Hold the jump rope handles in each hand. Jump over the rope as it passes under your feet. Land softly and keep a steady rhythm.

name: Cycling
instructions: Hop on a stationary bike or go for a ride outdoors. Pedal at a comfortable pace, adjusting resistance as needed. Maintain proper posture.

name: Walking
instructions: Walk at a brisk pace, swinging your arms in a natural motion. Maintain good posture and land softly on your feet.

name: Swimming
instructions: Engage in different strokes like freestyle, breaststroke, or backstroke. Swim laps at a comfortable pace, focusing on proper breathing.

name: Rowing
instructions: Sit on a rowing machine with proper posture. Push off with your legs, pull the handle toward your chest, and then extend your arms. Repeat in a fluid motion.
